ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50; Species: /Pimephales promelas/ (fathead minnow); Conditions: freshwater, static bioassay in Lake Superior water, 18-22 °C; Concentration: >200 mg/L for 1 hr; >200 mg/L for 24 hr; 103 mg/L for 48 hr; 158 mg/L for 72 hr; 155 mg/L for 96 hr

LC50; Species: Pimephales promelas (fathead minnow); Conditions: flow-through bioassay with measured concentrations, 24.6 °C, dissolved oxygen 7.1 mg/L, hardness 40.7 mg/L calcium carbonate, alkalinity 35.0 mg/L calcium carbonate, pH 7.83; Concentration: 162 mg/L for 96 hr
